revised_title: Decomposition Kinetics and Properties of Alkyl Peroxides
tldr: The author investigates the decomposition of dipropyl peroxide, ethyl hydrogen peroxide, and propyl hydrogen peroxide. They find that these peroxides decompose differently at various temperatures and pressures, with some decomposing heterogeneously and others luminously. The author also studies the reaction rates and products of these decompositions, providing insights into the properties and behavior of alkyl peroxides.
